additional_info:
Wardrobe, Furniture, Technique, Telephone, Internet, Cable-TV, Elevator, Heating system: central, Hot water: gas 
 Attention! Urgently for rent the apartment (88 sq.m) on Mitskevich street, in between the Mitskevich and AL.Kazbegh streets in completely new residential building on 13th floor.The apartment with 2 rooms and 2 bathrooms is designed by individual architectural project in modern minimalistic style. Apartment is designed and constructed with high quality materials, with central heating system. Modern designed kitchen, doors and furniture is made of MDF, with built-in appliances. There is a fireplace in apartment.  Repair works was made with high quality materials by qualified staff. The bathroom is made of high quality 60X60 Ceramic Granite tiles. It has a stylish built-in Italian bath (Villeroy&Boch) and hanging toilet seat with flush (HansGrohe). The modern stylish bathroom is equipped with Villeroy&Boch and Hansgrohe basin, shower and mixers. The partitions and ceiling is made of gypsum cardboard. The apartment is set with modern high quality Italian and German lightings. 
The Apartment will be arranged by all the necessary furniture and technical appliances: armchairs, chairs, tables, shelves, refrigerator, washing machine, telephone, TV, internet, etc.)
